Package gov.fnal.ppd.dd.changer

Fermilab's Dynamic Displays System -- Utility and helper classes for the main ChannelSelector GUI

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChannelCatalog
    An interface for dealing with the various sorts of catalogs of channels that can be in the system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddYourOwnURL
    Helper class for adding a new URL, temporarily, to the system.
    CategoryDictionary
    Retrieve the categories that are to be used by the ChannelSelector GUI
    ChannelButtonGrid
    Base class for the display grids that hold the channel buttons in the ChannelSelector
    ChannelCatalogFactory
    Singleton class to deal with getting the Channel Catalog to the client.
    ChannelCategory
    The way the channels are organized/sorted for the user.
    ChannelsFromDatabase
    Return all the channels from the database
    ConnectionToDynamicDisplaysDatabase
    Deal with the connection to the Dynamic Displays database.
    DDButton
    Create a JButton that can be put into a ButtonGroup.
    DetailedInformationGrid
    Create a grid of the channels that represent "Detailed Information"
    DisplayButtons
    Create the widget of the available displays for the Dynamic Displays "Channel Changer"
    DisplayChangeEvent
    The event that tells the world that a Display has changed (or reiterated) its status.
    DisplayListFactory
    Class that contains static methods for retrieving the displays in the system.
    DocentGrid
    Create a tab of images that can be shown on a Display.
    ImageGrid
    Create a tab of images that can be shown on a Display.
    InformationBox
    Creates a borderless pop-up window.
    TemporaryDialogBox
    Creates a borderless pop-up window.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DisplayChangeEvent.Type
    The type of event this is
